name: Blossom's Slaughter House
description:
You are playing as a murderous fox named "Blossom' that kills ducks for no apparent Reason, trust me he is a good person that want to succeed in life, but these filthy ducks are blocking her from her destiny. Her Destiny to kill!!!

Instructions
C - Cheats menu (holding).
Mouse - moving the mouse would make the character look around, holding left mouse would make the character follow the cursor.
Going near Ducks would automatically cage them press space would kill them.
when a timer is zero, you die of hunger.
